baseline_groups.claim_summary: Gavi vaccine program introduction increases vaccine coverage rates in recipient countries.
baseline_groups.notes: Three-way FE (country-disease, cohort-disease, country-cohort), clustered at country. Coef=3.60pp, p<1e-7. Primary paper claim.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Gavi vaccine program introduction reduces child mortality rates.
baseline_groups.notes: Mortality baseline shows POSITIVE coef (654.71, p=0.015), opposite of expected sign. Likely data reconstruction issue.

global_notes: Two main claims: (1) coverage increase (strongly supported), (2) mortality reduction (wrong sign in reconstructed data). Placebo test (BCG) shows significant positive effect, potentially undermining causal interpretation.
